remarks: Deduction for a group homomorphism.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Feb-2015.)
statement:
isghmd.x $e |- X = ( Base ` S ) $.
isghmd.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` T ) $.
isghmd.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
isghmd.b $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
isghmd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. Grp ) $.
isghmd.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. Grp ) $.
isghmd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> Y ) $.
isghmd.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .+^ ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
isghmd $p |- ( ph -> F e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d .+^ x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
